p: In the following section, the antimicrobial activity of selected EOs from above-mentioned aromatic and medicinal plants is discussed. The table of selected oils and strains of microorganisms they are active against is part of the supplementary information ( Table S2). Additionally, in the supplementary information, we have included GC-MS chromatograms ( Figures S1â€“S9) and a summary table of ingredients discussed in the study of oils ( Table S1).
